title: 乱码导致我不能玩MC
author: MC小子
txt_content:
为什我我一打开就会出现一些乱码:missing texture missing texture材质包有问题?
然后进入错误状态
错误状态的乱码是
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to D:\WindCraft客户端V1.5.2\WindCraft客户端V1.5.2\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-12_09.11.31-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 45f244b --------
Full report at:
D:\WindCraft客户端V1.5.2\WindCraft客户端V1.5.2\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-12_09.11.31-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-6-12 上午9:11

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.5.2
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_21, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 460310688 bytes (438 MB) / 523501568 bytes (499 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
        JVM Flags: 3 total; -Xincgc -Xms512m -Xmx1024m
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        FML: 
        LWJGL: 2.4.2
        OpenGL: ATI Radeon HD 4300/4500 Series GL version 3.3.11653 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.
        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'fml,forge'
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: Default
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.func_98305_c(FontRenderer.java:170)
        at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.func_98304_a(FontRenderer.java:151)
        at net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer.<init>(FontRenderer.java:112)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_71384_a(Minecraft.java:407)
        at net.minecraft.client.MinecraftAppletImpl.func_71384_a(SourceFile:56)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:732)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 88a45697 ----------谁知道啊 求教

replies.author: zhou960405
replies.txt_content: 可能是材质或者MOD的问题，你删除高清材质，或者找到冲突的MOD删掉就好了，嫌麻烦的话直接到懒人包发布版下个懒人包好了，存档可以移动的
